itemDescription: British colonial administrator, 9th Governor of Hong Kong, 1st Governor of Queensland (1821-1899)

wikipedia_page.main: Sir George Ferguson Bowen  (Chinese: 寶雲; 2 November 1821 – 21 February 1899), was an Irish author and colonial administrator whose appointments included postings to the Ionian Islands, Queensland, New Zealand, Victoria, Mauritius and Hong Kong.
